bioAsHtml: Laurent Grangeau is a Cloud Solution Architect at Sogeti with more than 10+ years of experience. Former Java developer, he has since developed in .NET, with Agile and DevOps mindsets. He has been experimenting with cloud providers for more than 5+ years. Docker enthusiast from the beginning, he has experienced with building microservices and distributed systems. He loves to automate things and run distributed applications at scale.

acceptedTalks.title: BOF Serverless + Docker + Kubernetes meetups all-in-one !

bio: Laurent Grangeau is a Cloud Solution Architect at Sogeti with more than 10+ years of experience. Former Java developer, he has since developed in .NET, with Agile and DevOps mindsets. He has been experimenting with cloud providers for more than 5+ years. Docker enthusiast from the beginning, he has experienced with building microservices and distributed systems. He loves to automate things and run distributed applications at scale.
